metadata.name: A Lost Memory
metadata.description:
How does it feel to lose something so precious to you?

Wednesday, 6th. The city streets are crowded but I’m here all alone. 
I lost the memory of my lover.
Let yourself be guided to another dimension: you're being transported inside a cinema, sit back and enjoy.

“A Lost Memory”
1920 x 1080 - Full HD - mp4

License:
Can be used to display privately, in commercial and & non-comm settings, in groups with an unlimited number of people. It includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, essays by the holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise/distribution.
